001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
006
007import java.util.Map;
008
009/* Least Absolute Shrinkage and Selection Operator */
010@Regularization.Target(Regularization.Target.Type.WEIGHTS)
011@Regularization.Effect(Regularization.Effect.Type.SPARSITY)
012public class LASSO<N extends Number> implements ExplicitRegularization<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
013
014    public static String HP_LAMBDA = "lambda";
015
016    private final JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport;
017    private N lambda;
018
019    public LASSO(JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport) {
020        this.typeSupport = typeSupport;
021    }
022
023    @Override
024    public JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> getNumberTypeSupport() {
025        return typeSupport;
026    }
027
028    public N getLambda() {
029        return lambda;
030    }
031
032    public void setLambda(N lambda) {
033        this.lambda = lambda;
034    }
035
036    @Override
037    public N lossPenalty(Array<N> parameters) {
038        N sum = getNumberTypeSupport().zero();
039        for (N param : parameters) {
040            sum = getNumberTypeSupport().add(sum, getNumberTypeSupport().absolute(param));
041        }
042        return getNumberTypeSupport().multiply(sum, lambda);
043    }
044
045    @Override
046    public N gradientAdjustment(N parameter) {
047        if (getNumberTypeSupport().isZero(parameter)) {
048            return getNumberTypeSupport().zero();
049        } else if (getNumberTypeSupport().isPositive(parameter)) {
050            return lambda;
051        } else {
052            return getNumberTypeSupport().negate(lambda);
053        }
054    }
055
056    @Override
057    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
058        return Map.of(HP_LAMBDA, getLambda());
059    }
060
061    @Override
062    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
063        if (name.equals(HP_LAMBDA)) {
064            setLambda(getNumberTypeSupport().cast(value));
065        }
066    }
067}
